scripts.start:dev: npm run swagger:bundle && env-cmd -f .env nodemon src/index.js
scripts.start:dev:custom: npm run swagger:bundle && env-cmd -f .env nodemon src/index.js --port=3081
scripts.start:3081: npm run swagger:bundle && env-cmd -f .env PORT=3081 nodemon src/index.js
scripts.start:server: cd backend && PORT=3081 npm run start
